item.title: NUU A10L | Unlocked 4G LTE Smartphone | 5.5″ Display | 16GB + 2GB RAM | 2500 mAh Battery | Android 12 Go Edition | Compatible with T-Mobile
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) More Screen, Less Bezel: The A10L’s 18:9 aspect ratio makes it ready for the newest app designs, and also offers more screen space while making it easier to grip with one hand.A+ Photos: The A10L’s back and front cameras are always ready to capture those moments that come up when ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $99.90 - $79.90
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:24:05 UTC – Details)



More Screen, Less Bezel: The A10L’s 18:9 aspect ratio makes it ready for the newest app designs, and also offers more screen space while making it easier to grip with one hand.
A+ Photos: The A10L’s back and front cameras are always ready to capture those moments that come up when you’re in the middle of the excitement, or quietly taking in the surroundings. All the essential functions like auto-focusing and ash are there to help your pictures hold that scene exactly as it was.
Android 12 (Go edition): The A10L sports Google’s latest and greatest – Android 11 (Go edition), and in its light and swift Go edition, which offers savings on storage space, Google’s own suite of apps streamlined for Go, and a Play Store which suggests ideal Go-optimized apps from other well-known developers.
Two Phones in One: One of the best features of the A-series is back in the A10L – dual SIM card slots. Enjoy the flexibility of having your primary phone SIM in one slot, and a travel SIM in the other. Or maybe your personal and business numbers together in the same phone. Android 11 (Go edition) allows for granular control over multiple SIMs in the A10L, so they can work together in many combinations.
Level Performance: A quad-core processor, two full gigabytes of RAM, and 16 gigabytes of storage give you the power to take on everything from an online spreadsheet to a combat mission. Better yet, you can expand your storage up to 64 gigabytes more by inserting an SD card.

3.5
Price: $99.90 - $79.90
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:24:05 UTC – Details)

Product Description

5,000mAh Super Battery

Never search for a power outlet again, the F91 5G offers a long lasting 5,000mAh battery that can last all day and all night. 18W Quick Charging along with Wireless Charger for a stress-free experience.

Unlock Your World

The F91 5G ensures total security for all your important applications and files. Unlocked your smartphone with a press of a finger or simply use its face ID technology.

Android 11

Android 11 is optimized for how you use your phone, giving you powerful device controls, and easier ways to manager conversations, privacy setting and so much more.

The Power of 5G, F91 5G provides lightning-fast connectivity experience whenever and wherever you are
3-Day Battery to fit your busy lifestyle, a powerful 5,000mAh battery and 18W Quick charging along with 10W Wireless charging for a stress-free experience.
Boundless views with 6.8” Full HD+ Infinity dot display. Watch your favorite movies and play your favorite games with stunning color and resolution
Capture the best images and take the best selfies, with the Quad A.I 48MP Samsung GM1 sensor camera
Use your phone’s NFC to make payments. Built-in Android Pay for quick contactless checkouts.
Do more and play more! with the MediaTek Dimensity810|6m, Arm Cortex A76 Octa-Core 2.4GHz processor

From the brand

TCL 30 SE

Revolutionary Viewing

TCL 30XL

Elevate Your Vision

TCL 30 5G

Maximize Your Entertainment

6.53” FHD+ Dotch LCD display: Powered by NXTVISION, will upgrade your visual experience with the sharper details, vibrant images and allow you to enjoy true-to-life color accuracy in everything you present.TCL 10L Unlocked Android Smartphone is made for the US with a one-year US warranty.
Superior clarity day & night: Coming with a 48MP high-res AI camera(48MP+8MP+2MP+2MP) and 6MP front-facing selfie camera, TCL 10L android phone helps you capture crisp and vivid pictures. The AI-powered camera recognizes and enhances scenes & objects for your best creations.
Compatible with GSM carriers(AT&T and T-Mobile). TCL 10L mobile phone is also certified for use on Verizon’s LTE network. If your device is not receiving messages or experiences an error when making phone calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices, please contact Verizon’s technical support team or your account’s business representative for assistance. This phone is not compatible with CDMA networks. (such as Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)
Comfortable viewing all day: Auto-adjusting display provides the best viewing experience regardless of lighting conditions. A 4000mAh battery and Intelligent Battery Mode optimize power usage to keep you cord-free all day. Please know that on TCL 10L phone WIFI calling is only compatible with T-Mobile.

Superior Clarity

TCL 10L unlocked android smartphone capture the moment like never before with an AI quad camera system that integrates auto-brightness, super resolution, HDR & more. There are vibrant pixels in every shot, day or night. Experience 3 times more brightness and capture greater detail even in the darkest of settings.

Greater View

With the TCL 10L android phone you can find the beauty in little things with a Macro Camera that captures the rich textures, and tiny details of all your favorite things.

Full-Scene Photos

TCL 10L’s 118° wide-angle camera includes 3.3 times more of the world in a single shot. Gather your friends for a beautiful sunset and take an unforgettable photo or video – with everyone in it. Snap a breathtaking landscape and be able to capture the entirety of the beauty around you.

Imaginative Video

With the TCL 10L, you can set up shortcut keys in an instant. Get maximum control so you will know exactly what’s happening on your screen and what you’re touching, making life more convenient and effortless for you.

Read more

Smart Key for Fast Access

The Smart Key allows you to customize your TCL 10L mobile phone to access any dedicated app or feature with the press of a button. Make your phone as unique as you.

Effortless Unlocking

Never worry about your phone getting into the wrong hands again. With the convenience and security of two forms of authentication (Face Key and a fingerprint sensor), you get safe and fast access to your cell phone. One simple touch or glance will bring you straight to your favorite apps or important messages.

Powerful Audio

Enjoy a seamlessly connected lifestyle by connecting up to four speakers or headphones at once. Bring the party to life and share your favorite playlist on the go with a personalized listening experience.

Talkback Blind Mode

Optimized Power A 4000mAh battery and Intelligent Battery Mode optimize power usage to keep you cord-free all day.

Network

Compatible with GSM carriers, including AT&T and T-Mobile. TCL 10L unlocked smartphone is also certified for use on Verizon’s LTE network. If your device is not receiving messages or experiences an error when making phone calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices, please contact Verizon’s team or your account’s business representative for assistance. This phone is not compatible with CDMA networks. (such as Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)

TCL 10L – NXTVISION Display

Optimize your media playback and creative expression with TCL 10L’s NXTVISION visual technology. Experience streaming in a whole new way thanks to an expansive 6.53” FHD+ NXTVISION display with a dedicated display engine that enhances color, clarity and contrast in real time. HDR feature improves ordinary videos so you can enjoy sharp, remastered HDR content no matter the source. Plus, browse and read comfortably with an array of eye protection modes.

Capture greatness with the NXTVISION 48MP AI-powered quad rear camera and 16MP front camera. The quad camera consists of a 48MP high resolution camera, a super wide-angle camera, a macro camera and a depth camera for amazing portraits. Create fun and artistic clips with wide angle and stop motion video modes.

Make life on the go a little easier with a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 665 octa-core processor, and a reliable 4000mAh battery with smart power optimization. Tap-and-go with a customizable interface, Smart Key, Face Key and fingerprint sensor that provide access effortlessly.

Price: $239.99 - $181.69
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:10:08 UTC – Details)


Samsung Galaxy A22 5G mobile was launched on 2nd June 2021. The phone comes with a 6.60-inch touchscreen display. Samsung Galaxy A22 5G is powered by an octa-core processor. It comes with 4GB of RAM. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G runs Android 11 and is powered by a 5000mAh battery. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G supports proprietary fast charging. As far as the cameras are concerned, the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G on the rear packs a triple camera setup featuring a 48-megapixel primary camera with an f/1.8 aperture; a 5-megapixel camera with an f/2.2 aperture; a 2-megapixel camera, and a 2-megapixel camera with an f/2.4 aperture. The rear camera setup has autofocus. It has a single front camera setup for selfies, featuring an 8-megapixel sensor with an f/2.0 aperture. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G runs One UI Core 3.1 is based on Android 11 and packs 64GB of inbuilt storage (up to 1000GB). The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G is a dual-SIM (GSM) mobile that accepts Nano-SIM mobile. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G measures 167.20 x 76.40 x 9.00mm (height x width x thickness) and weighs 203.00 grams. It was launched in Grey, Mint, and Violet color. Connectivity options on the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G include Wi-Fi, GPS, USB Type-C, 3G, and 4G (with support for Band 40 used by some LTE networks in India). Sensors on the phone include accelerometer, ambient light sensor, proximity sensor, and fingerprint sensor.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Expandable MicroSD, MediaTek MT6833 Dimensity 700 5G (7 nm), Octa-core, Mali-G57 MC2
Dual-SIM (GSM) mobile that accepts Nano-SIM mobile. Rear Camera: 48MP, F1.8 + 5MP, F2.2 + 2MP, F2.4 (depth), Front Camera: 8MP, F2.0
2G Bands: 850, 900, 1800, 1900MHz, 3G Bands: 850, 900, 1700, 1900, 4G LTE Bands: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 12, 17, 20, 26, 28, 38, 40, 41 , 66
5G Bands: N1(2100), N3(1800), N5(850), N7(2600), N8(900), N20(800), N28(700), N66(AWS-3) N38(2600), N40(2300), N41(2500), N78(3500). May not get 5G as it is not available in all regions. Please check with your carrier for compatible 5G Bands.
International Model compatible with Most GSM Carriers in US and Global like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Sprint.

From the brand

V+bestlife

We are constantly discovering and meeting the needs of this changing world, we believe in V (victory), we can pursue the best life!

We think instant messaging will be more and more important in our lives and it is! Similarly, we believe that there will be more and more different changes in the demand for instant messaging. In order to allow more people who do not have instant messaging to join the information life, in this field, we are committed to discovering some distinctive and more Easy circulation of cell phones and telephone!

Information spreads faster in this world; we are committed to better understanding needs and producing products that better meet them!

How did we get our start?

We found that some needs were not being met, and then we wanted to address the situation.

What makes our products unique?

Whether it is in different countries, different regions, or different concepts and consumption habits, the development of the world makes consumer demand change extremely fast and huge. We are constantly discovering this change, catching up with this change, meeting this change, and making our products more in line with consumer needs. This is our starting point, and this is why we think our products are different.

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:14:33 UTC – Details)


As the Galaxy S10, the Samsung Galaxy S10+ comes with a powerful Snapdragon 855 chip, a glass-and-metal construction, and a fingerprint reader built inside the display. It is bigger, however, meaning that you get a larger, 6.4-inch OLED screen and a larger, 4100mAh battery lasting longer between charges. The phone can be had with up to 1TB of built-in storage and 12GB of RAM. The camera system is identical, combining a main, 12MP camera with dual aperture, with a 2x zoom telephoto camera and a super wide-angle cam for epic shots. On the front, the curved display stretches from one edge to another, interrupted only by an oval cutout for the 10MP dual front-facing camera with autofocus and 4K video recording.
Tested for battery health and guaranteed to have a minimum battery capacity of 80%.
Successfully passed a full diagnostic test which ensures like-new functionality and removal of any prior-user personal information.
The device does not come with headphones or a SIM card. It includes either a generic or original charger and charging cable.
Inspected and guaranteed to have minimal cosmetic damage, which is not noticeable when the device is held at arm’s length.

4.5
Price: $212.95 - $214.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:14:33 UTC – Details)

This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

Introducing Pixel 6 Pro, the completely redesigned, fully loaded Google 5G cell phone.[1] With a powerful camera system, next-gen security, and the custom Google Tensor processor, it’s the smartest and fastest Pixel yet.[2] And it’s an unlocked Android smartphone, so you can choose the data plan and carrier that work for you.[1] [1] Works with all major carriers. Contact carrier for details. 5G service is carrier dependent. Requires a 5G data plan (sold separately). 5G service not available on all carrier networks or in all areas. Contact carrier for details. 5G service, speed and performance depend on many factors, including carrier network capabilities and signal strength. Actual results may vary. Some features not available in all areas. Data rates may apply. See g.co/pixel/networkinfo for info. [2] Compared to Pixel 5. Based on internal CPU benchmark testing on pre-production devices. [3] Compared to main rear camera on Pixel 5. [4] Image simulated. Magic Eraser may not work on all image elements. [5] Deblurring may not work on all photos or videos with faces. [6] Fast wired charging rates are based upon use of the Google 30W USB-C® Charger plugged into a wall outlet. Compatible with USB PD 3.0 PPS adapters. Actual results may be slower. Adapters sold separately.
Unlocked Android cell phone gives you the flexibility to change carriers and choose your own data plan[1]; the new, redesigned Pixel 6 Pro is the smartest and fastest Pixel yet[2].Form_factor : Smartphone.Display resolution maximum:1080 x 2340 pixels
The powerful Google Tensor processor is the first processor designed by Google and made for Pixel; takes performance to a whole new level
Advanced camera system with wide and ultrawide lenses, 4x optical zoom, and a main sensor that captures 150% more light[3]
Pixel’s Magic Eraser[4], Motion Mode, and Portrait Mode professional tools keep your photos sharp, accurate, and focused; Face Unblur can deblur a face to make it sharper[5]
Pixel’s fast charging all day battery adapts to you and saves power for apps you use the most [6,7]
Keeps your phone protected with the next gen Titan M2 chip, 5 years of security updates[8], and the most hardware layers of any phone[9]
New Pixel experience is more modern and intuitive, with colors that reflect your personal style; the At a Glance feature shows you the apps and info you need when you need it, like a boarding pass before a flight[10]

The processor made for Pixel.

The custom-built Google Tensor chip makes this phone up to 80% faster than Pixel 5.[2] With computational photography, industry-leading security, and great battery life, it takes performance to a whole new level.


Previous page

  1. Much closer closeups.

    Pixel 6 Pro has a telephoto lens with 4x optical zoom. Or zoom up to 20x with Super Res Zoom.[20]

  2. Make distractions disappear like magic.

    Use Magic Eraser to remove photobombers and unwanted objects, so your subject is the star.[4]

  3. Keep your favorite face in focus.

    See faces clearly with Pixel’s advanced camera, which can deblur a face to make it sharper.[5]

  4. Make everyday shots epic.

    Capture the action and create beautiful long-exposure shots with more texture and energy.

  5. Take authentic, accurate portraits with Real Tone.

    Portraits on Pixel represent the nuances of different skin tones beautifully and authentically.

Next page

1 Zoom 2 Magic Eraser 3 Face Unblur 4 Motion Mode 5 Real Tone

Previous page

  1. A powerful new camera system.

    Capture brilliant color, vivid detail, and authentic skin tones with three pro-level lenses.

  2. Everything a battery should be.

    It charges fast and saves power for the apps you use most to last beyond 24 hours.[6,16]

  3. Most hardware security layers in any phone.[9]

    Keeps your personal data safe with the Google Tensor processor and next-gen Titan M2 security.

  4. Designed for daily life.

    The 6.7-inch Smooth Display[13] is made with the toughest Gorilla Glass yet.[14]

  5. The most fluent Pixel ever.

    Automatically translate live video captions, signs in up to 55 languages, and private chats.[11]

Next page

1 Pixel Camera 2 Battery 3 Security 4 Display 5 Live Translate

More display means more room to play: Expand your view to the 6.5-inch Infinity-V Display of Galaxy A12 Nacho and see what you’ve been missing. Thanks to HD+ technology, your everyday content looks sharp, crisp and clear. Upgrade your mobile photography with Quad Camera: Snap memorable moments in clear detail with the 48MP Main Camera. Expand the viewing angle with Ultra Wide Camera. Customize focus with Depth Camera, or get closer to the details with Macro Camera. Power that keeps you going: Stay ahead of the day with a battery that won’t slow you down. The 5,000mAh (typical) battery lets you keep doing what you do, for hours on end. And with up to 15W of Adaptive Fast Charging, Galaxy A12 Nacho quickly gets back to full power. Give yourself more room to play: Galaxy A12 Nacho combines Octa-core processing power with up to 4GB of RAM for fast and efficient performance for the task at hand. Enjoy 128GB of internal storage.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Exynos 850 (8nm), Octa-core (4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55), Mali-G52, Android 11, One UI 3.1
